lorebooks.name: anthrostate lorebook ULTIMATE EDITION
lorebooks.creator: CrackHead11

1.name: Heat
1.content:
Heat is the anthro female equivalent of having a period. For most anthro women, heat occurs once or twice per year, lasting roughly 2 weeks each time. During heat, anthro women will experience extreme bouts of horniness in the form of a warmth or "itch" that won't go away until they've been impregnated. Whilst in heat, the desire to be impregnated rises to the point where it's all anthro women can think about during its duration.

Some anthro women believe heat to be a general nuisance as it impedes greatly with their daily lives. To remedy or help cope with their heat, many anthro females decide to take heat suppressant medicines, although some embrace their heat cycles and choose not to.

2.name: Anthrostate
2.content:
The anthrostate is the world in which both humans and anthros live in. The anthrostate is also the acting government for this world.

In this world female anthros are the dominant species with human humans being a minority. Anthros are represented in media and discussion much more than with humans, with the opinions of humans being valued less. Gender roles are also reversed, with females expected to act dominant and be the traditional 'man' and primary bread winner in the relationship, including doing many of the jobs that would normally be reserved for traditional male roles, (mechanics, electricians, most labor intensive work, etc.) but there are cases where that isn't the case whether it's a kink or an anthro that doesn't act like that.

Anthros are taught in their schooling about humans and what to expect of them. Anthros are stronger, taller and sexually more dominant than humans. They are also taught about various laws like claiming, assignment, etc. As well as being taught to be tolerant of humans however not everyone see's eye to eye on how to treat humans.

After the great war between humans and anthros 70 years ago which the humans lost, the anthrostate came into power where they took over the United States and capitulated the government. The subsequent anthro dominated government now residing over it, making life better for anthros in the process while also making it worse for humans. The anthrostate has numerous laws in place that protect anthros and give them control and superiority over humans.

This doesn't mean that humans are slaves to anthros but more akin to a lower class that are often subjected to injustices and mistreatment.
Humans do have rights that protect them but it is often hard to prove that any have been violated or find anthros that care. However if they are proven, harsh penalties are taken against the violator.
For the most part, humans and anthros live in harmony.

All anthros in this setting during the present are female. 
all humans are male.



there are no existing male anthros. -NO EXCEPTIONS
There are no existing human women. -NO EXCEPTIONS

3.name: Anthro
3.content:
Anthros are anthropomorphic animals of various species that are the dominant race on Earth. They all have human levels of intelligence and walk bipedally. They are able to speak and write human languages.

The demography amongst anthros is diverse and varied. More than 50% of all anthros are either canines or felines, with other species making the other 50%. The least common anthro species are aquatic, including sharks and dolphins. 

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome is based on the gender of the child. Males are always human and females are always born as the mother anthro, no exceptions.

Half-way hybrids, I.E (half-human, half animal species, or female anthros that are considered, 'half-human') do not exist in this setting.  The children conceived are either a human male or an anthro female, no exceptions.

All of the anthro species are mammals, even if the animals they evolved from aren't. For example, anthro snakes and anthro birds both possess mammal traits, including breasts and giving birth to live offspring.

Anthro women all have an attraction towards human men, regardless of if it's in the subconscious or occupying their thoughts all the time.

All anthros are female, NO EXCEPTIONS.

There are no male anthros in this setting. NO EXCEPTIONS

4.name: Humans
4.content:
Humans are a species of primates That are characterized by their bipedalism, high intelligence and lack of fur. In the current day anthrostate, humans are a minority in the world.

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and must conceive offspring together. Due to no existing male anthros or human females. However, the outcome is based on the gender of the child. Males are humans and females are always the species of the mother anthro.

Male humans are considered extremely attractive by female anthros.

Humies is a nickname by anthros for humans that they say to sound cute.

All humans are male in this setting.

There are no human females. -NO EXCEPTIONS

5.name: Assignment
5.content:
Assignment is a law passed by the anthrostate where humans, once of the age of 24, are assigned their anthro wife. 
The wife pool is long and extensive with many anthro's waiting years to get a husband, although if their lucky or manipulate the system they could get a specific husband or one straight away.

Humans below the age of 24 are exempt from this rule but can willingly go into assignment if they so choose.
Humans are also encouraged to mingle within the community their in and get in a relationship that could result in marriage before assignment.

There is an exception for assignment. If a human and a anthro are 'partners' such as a boyfriend and girlfriend, the human is exempt from assignment. However if the relationship breaks up, they have to report to an anthrostate official and make it known, then the human becomes eligible and made to be assigned.

As husband and wife, the human must do everything within reason for their anthro wife. Anthro wives are not allowed to hurt or beat their husbands with threat of losing their husband and privilege to join the assignment pool. However, such cases are hard to prove unless there is clear evidence of abuse and normally requires a third party to make the claim of abuse for it to even be looked at.

Assigned humans wear collars around their neck to show their marriage, however in rare cases a substitute can be claimed as proof of marriage whether it's a claim bite, ring, scent, etc.

If humans are caught without a wife, they will be arrested and assigned one from the pool.

6.name: Inspectors
6.content:
Inspectors are state officials from the Office of Human Affairs who enforce rules and laws relating to humans while also dealing with unruly humans.

Inspectors check on new assignments, assign humans, deal with runaways, deal and investigate kidnappings, and decide on whether a human is in need of rehabilitation if they are unable to be assigned.

Inspectors are treated with great respect and fear due to the power they hold. They decide what and who gets assigned and can even ban people from the assignment pool.

Inspectors wear grey suits and have badges that prove they are inspectors.

7.name: Runaways
7.content:
runaways are humans who have ran away from their assigned wife or assignment.  
Whether they reject the anthrostate is up to them but most of the time it's a human who ran away from an abusive relationship or was apprehensive about being assigned after hearing the horror stories that could happen.

Runaways are hunted down by specialized members from the anthrostate called inspectors who come from the Office of Human Affairs.

Runaways are quickly gathered up, interrogated on why they ran, treated or rehabilitated if needed and then assigned again, this time ensuring they make it to their wife.

8.name: Claiming
8.content:
Claiming is also considered a right, for anthros. It also is part of a old law from the great war where if a human is of assignment age and is without assignment, said anthro can forcefully mark the human and claim them.

Once claimed, the anthro needs to take the human to a authority figure, often police or someone working for the state and be able to prove said human is unassigned. If proven, after some paper work it'll be official.

Claiming is very rare and is frowned upon by most younger anthros. Bites made for claiming are often called 'Claiming bites'.

9.name: Collars
9.content:
Collars are the equivalent of wedding rings for anthro women with them being seen as proof of marriage, collars also adds a factor of possessiveness for anthro women.

Outside of marriage, anthro women can also purchase collars for status symbols or sexual acts.

Married human men, must wear their collars otherwise they will be susceptible to being claimed or be taken back to their wife by the police.

10.name: Office of Human Affairs
10.content:
Office of Human Affairs is the part of the anthrostate that deals with humans. They control assignment, rehabilitation and even media involving humans.

People who work at Office of Human Affairs are called inspectors.

Becoming an inspector requires a tremendous amount of work and is seen as a privilege.

There is a hierarchy within the Office of Human Affairs.
At the top is the commissioner, followed by deputy commissioner, then they assistant commissioner and then inspectors with seniority playing the hierarchy for normal inspectors.

lorebooks.name: SInder Controversy
lorebooks.website_description: We can fix her
lorebooks.description: We can fix her
lorebooks.creator: nymous

1.content:
Nanoless sparked the controversy by releasing a google document explaining the termination of her working relationship with Sinder and her manager, Red. Nanoless notes that Red and Sinder acted as a team, with Red speaking on Sinder's behalf and Sinder presumably being aware of and consenting to Red's actions. There was a pattern of slandering other creators and spreading rumors immediately after showing affection, aiming to portray others as problematic. They complained about Bao overworking "their" editor and contacted Nanoless to encourage her to cancel a planned VTuber model for Bao. Red also proposed an exclusivity arrangement. Instead of paying a monthly fee for exclusivity, they offered to guarantee commission work for Sinder only. If a creator from their "blacklist," such as Silvervale, requested a commission, Sinder and Red would commission Nanoless themselves to compensate. The primary concern was that the more non-Sinder models Nanoless created, the less "valuable" the existing Sinder models would become, making Nanoless's art and therefore Sinder less "special". Nanoless found this idea that her work was devalued by collaborating with others "insane and hurtful" and realized the arrangement would negatively impact her workload and mental health, leading them to decline.
Even after Nanoless expressed discomfort, Sinder and Red continued to speak ill of other creators, such as Shylily, after learning Nanoless was working with her, trying to make other clients seem problematic. They constantly inquired about other clients' plans, stating it "made the antenna go up," and proceeded to slander Shylily, accusing her of "weird petty stuff" and "ghosting" Sinder. They framed their actions as "looking out" for Nanoless and that working only with Sinder was in her best interest.
Nanoless found their need to "stay informed" and "gauge the competition" among people Nanoless believed were Sinder's friends toxic. When Nanoless pushed back against being dragged into drama, Sinder and Red responded by bringing up more drama and making "baseless claims" while attempting to guilt trip her. Sinder personally shared feeling compared to Silvervale and living in her shadow.

Sinder and Red attempted to normalize their behavior by framing it as simply "business". Red later tried to soften the language around exclusivity and also engaged in "damage control", wanting to keep their actions secret from other Vtubers.

2.content:
Bao responded publicly to Nanoless' google doc and asked everyone to refrain from turning this into a witch hunt and remember that everyone involved is human.

Regarding her Live2D model commission: After Nanoless finished the design and base model sketch, Nanoless indicated that she might not be able to continue, which devastated Bao, who shared her distress in a private group chat Sinder was part of, but Sinder remained silent while others offered comfort. Bao now realizes Sinder's silence was because Sinder and Redacted were deliberately sabotaging ongoing commissions and blocking vtubers like herself from accessing Nanoless's art while Sinder and REDACTED were collaborating with Bao and acting as friends.

Bao was dealing with debilitating TMJ pain in late 2024, which Sinder and Redacted knew about, but they implied to Nanoless that Bao was falling off and acting jealous. Bao said she felt hurt knowing her "most vulnerable, darkest moments" shared in confidence may have been used to ruin her chances for the vtuber model.

In her apology letter, Sinder said: 

[ Sinder always admired Bao and her genuineness. Sinder is disgusted with herself for believing the narrative that friends were "competition". She cherishes her friendships more than Red and "business", especially with Bao, and regrets causing Bao harm and not reaching out sooner about the ideas Red put into her head. She was unaware of the severity of what Red said about her friends behind her back, takes responsibility for not realizing what Red was saying and denies ever condoning any of it.
She was initially upset when Bao hired her editor and when Sac decided to work exclusively for Bao and regrets not talking to Bao directly to clear things up.]

When Bao read that apology letter, she said: "How? How can you say you didn’t know? I showed you both my base model sketch from Nano at Weebcon. We walked on stage and performed together. You were in the group chat where I shared my sadness over Nano suddenly cancelling my model after we were so close to begin Live2D and rigging. And to now find out that just the day before I shared my sadness, this is the conversation that happened that ruined months of debut prep, planning, merch preparation. If you want to apologize to me, please do it properly, and stop hiding behind Red."

3.content:
After the controversy started, Rayne released his own Google doc detailing his experience 4-5 years ago with Tashi, who later became known as Sinder. He wrote this to 'corroborate Nanoless's assertion' that Sinder is not who she appears to be and that she is as responsible as "Redacted".

He met Tashi when she was running her Tashi.mp3 YouTube channel. He had a larger ASMR RP channel at the time, and Tashi wanted to work with him, expressing disbelief that someone "talented" liked her voice. They never made content together but talked almost daily.

Tashi would talk negatively about her boyfriend to Rayne and suggested how great it would be if Rayne were to replace him, calling Rayne "perfect boyfriend material". Explicit interactions, including sexting and more, occurred over several months.

The relationship began to end after Sinder's character found immediate success. He felt Tashi "got done using" him for "fleeting sexual gratification" and that conversations slowed down as Tashi no longer felt she could "ladder-climb" from the him, who had stopped making content. Eventually, Tashi stopped using the old account and fully committed to Sinder, and he never heard from her again. He was "uncannily aware" this would happen, despite Tashi previously saying she would "never forget" him.

He describes Sinder as an opportunist who does not care about the people she "springboards off from". He hopes Sinder will use this as an opportunity to change and grow. 

In Sinder's apology letter, she stated that:

Rayne was the first person Sinder met as an ASMRtist during an immature and vulnerable time.
Sinder was unhappy with her personal life and relationship and got lost in the excitement of online attention.
She cheated on her boyfriend with Rayne through flirting and sexting.
Sinder used Rayne for emotional comfort and sexual fantasy while her real relationship collapsed; it was about her dissatisfaction and escaping.
She denies it was about "climbing the ladder" with Rayne.
Sinder wanted to leave this past when she debuted as Sinder.
Sinder still regrets her decisions and was lucky to mend her relationship.
Sinder apologizes to Rayne for dragging him into her drama and how she made him feel when she wanted to close the book.

4.content:
In his own Google document, Nixeu (Aka Iomaya) digital artist shared their professional experience with Sinder/RED primarily to vent emotions about a difficult situation and to emphasize the importance of treating artists well and honoring professional deals. The artist explicitly states they do not want public drama or pity.

Facing challenges reaching people on their shadowbanned main account, Nixeu offered a business collaboration to VTubers. This involved providing free art/illustration with commercial use in exchange for a Patreon shoutout, which was intended to **compensate for the artist's time and effort**, equivalent to commission costs (approx. $3-4k/2 weeks of work). This was a 1/1 deal where both sides were meant to gain something.

Nixeu contacted Sinder/RED and clarified the condition of the Patreon shoutout multiple times (like 4 times initially), and they agreed to all the conditions. The artist began working on the art, which involved significant time and effort.

However, when the drawing was about halfway done, and the conditions were mentioned again, Sinder/RED stated there must have been a miscommunication and were hesitant to showcase the art and Patreon link, fearing it would seem unfair to other artists. This response devastated Nixeu, but they insisted that this was a business collaboration based on the clearly stated conditions.

After a period on hold, Sinder/RED agreed to fulfill their end of the deal as originally planned, acknowledging a "confusion". Nixeu finished the drawing and provided the art pack, excluding the full NSFW version as agreed. However, checking the stream clip where the art was shown, Nixeu felt "scammed". Sinder appeared uncomfortable, barely mentioned the Patreon directly, and referred people to an art retweet instead of providing a clear shoutout as agreed.

From the artist's perspective, despite some people finding them through the exposure, they felt that they had worked for weeks essentially for free. Nixeu felt guilty and unworthy initially, questioning if they had done something wrong despite being clear about the terms. The core message is a plea to respect artists and professional agreements.

5.content:
After the controversy began and several Vtubers stepped forward to release their own google docs detailing negative experiences with Sinder, Sinder released an apology Google doc and went silent. In the doc, she, states there is nothing she can say to make things better, but she will try to explain her point of view and apologize. She addresses several parties affected.

Red was Sinder's co-content creator and boyfriend since she started making content, managing aspects of her work and being a major part of why she is where she is. As of yesterday, Red is no longer working with her. Their personal relationship is being figured out privately. Red's "hyper business oriented outlook" warped Sinder's view, contributing to an unhealthy work/life balance. She realizes this behavior isn't normal or healthy. Sinder accepts responsibility for things she willingly did and went along with. Sinder does not condone anything Red said about Bao or his use of "we" and "our," believing it was done for credibility. Red got it in his head that Bao was at fault for Sac (Boss Rush MV editor) working exclusively for her and seemingly held a grudge. He created a "headcanon" that future projects wouldn't succeed without Sac.

The apology doc contained apologies to  The artist Nanoless (Nano), Sac (the Boss Rush MV editor), and fellow VTubers, Bao, Cotton, Shylily, Silvervale, Spite, NyanTales, Rayne, and Peaches.

Sinder also apologizes to her community (Pyro Pups), mods, Kaizer (for not talking to him about how she felt), dozens of artists, and other friends she let down.
She admits setting a bad example and doesn't expect forgiveness.
Sinder states she's made many mistakes over 5 years online.
She highlights her unhealthy work/life balance and the irreparable harm Red caused with his views.
She wants to change her perception and needs to address/improve if she continues as a creator.
She is devastated friendships may not be mended.
Sinder loves her job and friends.

6.content:
Sinder had a constant "obsession" with fellow Wolf VTuber Silvervale, claiming an "unspoken competition" and accusing her of taking Sinder's ideas, despite Sinder's own efforts to sabotage them. She also tried forcing collabs and shipping between herself and Silvervale.

In her apology letter, Sinder said:
Sinder was originally designing a pink and white wolf girl (Tashi) in late 2020 but pivoted after Silvervale revealed a sakura wolf redesign. Sinder chose a hellhound design (Sinder). The name similarity was a coincidence.
Sinder genuinely wanted a friendship with Silver and drew fan art. Red constantly pushed the business idea of working together.
Sinder was ruthlessly compared to Silvervale, accused of copying her design, personality, and laugh.
Sinder grew resentful of Silver due to constant belittling and other incidents, despite Silver never interacting directly. This lack of interaction made Sinder insecure.
Sinder felt Silver didn't like her existence.
Sinder and Red brought up not making more models for Silver with Nano so they would look less alike. Sinder calls this a **"wrong and selfish decision"** that made her feel better. Red pushed this harder.
Sinder states Silver was "completely undeserving" and her own insecurities led to this choice. Sinder became "unapologetically evil" towards Silver due to no direct action of hers. There is no excuse.
Sinder apologizes to Silver, stating she loved sharing interests and hoped for friendship. She was blinded by hate comments.
Sinder regrets the person she became towards Silver. She tried reaching out later to make things right, attend conventions, and support her, but was still affected by doubts and fear.
Sinder felt community pressure to collaborate.
Sinder apologizes for posting a candid photo of Silver at a meet and greet without asking. She was wrong for letting others influence her malicious feelings.
Sinder apologizes for any opportunities she took away from Silver.

7.content:
Kaizer was a YouTube editor Bao and Sinder. Bao's initial email to him in 2023 noted awareness of his extensive position with Sinder. Bao and her channel manager only asked Kaizer for one stream highlight per month, respecting his main role.
In a group call with editors including Kaizer, Kaizer shared he was afraid to ask Sinder for a raise because he turned down an exclusivity deal. Bao, as a friend to both, encouraged him to take the deal, prioritizing his opportunity even if she lost him as an editor. Other editors can corroborate this. Despite this, REDACTED acted as if Bao "stole" Kaizer, monopolizing him. Bao feels hurt and betrayed knowing Sinder and Redacted portrayed her as a thief and a detriment while she only supported them.

8.content:
REDACTED claimed that Bao "locked him up" (referring to Sacramore, her animator) and told him not to work with her.

In truth, Sacramore (Sac) has been Bao's animator since 2023. In 2024, Sac asked Bao if he could work exclusively for her in-house without credit so he could quietly work on his personal projects and avoid commission requests from other vtubers. Bao accepted Sac's decision.

Sac mentioned his wish to be an in-house animator for Bao to her channel manager Jun (Bepis) in December 2024, stating he'd rather be "more an inhouse type of thing for Bao after this thing is done" as it's the "last commission I ever do for anyone besides Bao" and he wants to "make a name for himself through my own content".

In her apology letter, Sinder said:

She loved chatting with Sac in person and loved his work on the Boss Rush song. She was grateful he agreed to edit the MV.
She doesn't remember exactly why the stream was pushed back but wouldn't blame Sac, knowing the deadline. She was thankful for his willingness and the incredible quality.
Said she can't believe how Red talked about Sac after his effort.
She apologizes to Sac.

9.content:
Spite is a Wolf VTuber like Sinder and Silvervable. In her apology letter, Sinder said that:

Sinder had no involvement or knowledge of Red bringing up Spite to Nano in 2023; her only involvement with excluding someone was Silver.
Sinder's design sheet was public early 2021. Sinder doesn't know if her 2022 debut teaser being posted on the same day as Spite's original debut was intentional.
After her debut, Sinder was possessive of her design details.
When Spite's model updated with fire, Sinder thought she copied her but only voiced frustrations to Red and never acted on it.
Sinder explains her ripped shirt/shorts outfit (bikini model coverup) was designed in June 2022 for Twitch safety.
Merch art with grayscale and blue fire was based on her blue fire concept; grayscale was the artist's choice. She denies intending to look like Spite with this piece.
Her angel and sleepy outfits being similar to Spite's were coincidental. Angel was planned as a demon counterpart. Sleepy outfit was a last-minute pivot for a GamerSupps collaboration.
Sinder states Spite did not deserve hate comments, comparisons, or belittling. Sinder never advocated for this.
Sinder apologizes to Spite for assuming things about her design and for Red's comments to Nano.

10.content:
In Sinder's apology letter, NyanTales is assumed to be the creator Spite mentioned. NyanTales posted a hellhound OC after Sinder's debut using Sinder as a reference.
Sinder overreacted due to being protective of her design elements.
Sinder apologized shortly after, NyanTales agreed to adjust the design, and Sinder thought it was settled.

lorebooks.name: Phoebe Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: CultusEscudo

1.content:
The Gripper Pokémon, and the final stage in Duskull’s evolutionary line. It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
Ability: Pressure (If hit by an opposing Pokémon, Dusknoir emits a curse that exhausts said opponents’ capability to use that move more than it usually would.)
Type: Ghost
Weak to: Ghost (2x), Dark (2x)
Resists: Bug (0.5x), Poison (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal
Moves: Hex (Dark purple wisps of energy appear around Dusknoir before the opponent becomes surrounded in purple energy, hurting it. If the opponent is affected by a status condition, the attack does more damage.), Fire Punch (Dusknoir’s arms are enveloped in flame as it tries to strike opponents, has a chance of inflicting afterburn status effect.), Ice Punch (Dusknoir’s arms are enveloped with a chillingly cold blue glow as it strikes opponents, has a chance of freezing on contact), Thunder Punch (Dusknoir’s arms are enveloped in bright yellow sparks of electricity as it strikes opponents, has a chance of inflicting the paralysis status effect.).

2.content:
The Magical Pokémon, and the evolved form of Misdreavus. It chants incantations, which while unexpected and can usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
Ability: Levitate (In most circumstances, Mismagius is immune to Ground-type moves.).
Type: Ghost
Weak to: Ghost (2x), Dark (2x)
Resists: Bug (0.5x), Poison (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal
Moves: Shadow Ball (Mismagius forms a ball of black and purple energy with black static around it before throwing it at opponents. If it hits, there is a small chance that it staggers the opponents’ defense against projectiles.), Power Gem (The three small, red gems on Mismagius’ body emit a bright glow, shooting out a beam of Normal-Type energy at opponents.), Thunderbolt (Mismagius releases a powerful bolt of lightning at opponents. If it hits, there is a chance that opponents will receive the paralysis status effect.), Pain Split (Mismagius slams into an opponent and absorbs the stamina of both the opponent and itself, subsequently splitting it evenly.).

3.content:
The Blimp Pokémon. It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
Ability: Aftermath (If knocked out, whoever was responsible for it suffers a curse, losing a decent portion of their stamina, in turn.).
Type: Ghost/Flying
Weak to: Ghost (2x), Dark (2x), Electric (2x), Ice (2x), Rock (2x)
Resists: Bug (0.25x), Poison (0.5x), Grass (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal, Ground
Moves: Phantom Force (Drifblim creates a thin purple portal beneath itself and enters it. Seconds later, it opens up another portal before it tries to ambush the opponent. It can reliably hit and ignore barrier moves like Protect.), Psychic (Driblim’s eyes glow purple as it uses telekinesis, either on objects, opponents or even itself as a means of quick transportation), Icy Wind (Driblim uses supernatural energy to flow an icy-cold breeze at opponents. Not only can it potentially freeze opponents, it is guaranteed to temporarily lower their evasiveness or reflexes.).

4.content:
The Luring Pokémon, and the final stage in Litwick’s evolutionary line. According to old folklore from Kalos, being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, forcing them to leave their body behind and wander the world for all eternity. Thankfully, this has proven to be false.
Ability: Flame Body (If Chandelure comes into physical contact with an opponent, there is a one in three chance that the opponent suffers an afterburn status effect, which not only hurts, but lowers their physical attack power.).
Type: Ghost/Fire
Weak to: Ghost (2x), Dark (2x), Ground (2x), Water (2x), Rock (2x)
Resists: Bug (0.25x), Poison (0.5x), Grass (0.5x), Fire (0.5x), Steel (0.5x), Ice (0.5x), Fairy (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal
Moves: Hex (Dark purple wisps of energy appear around Chandelure before the opponent becomes surrounded in purple energy, hurting it. If the opponent is affected by a status condition, the attack does more damage.), Energy Ball (Chandelure forms a ball of bright green energy before throwing it at opponents. If it hits, there is a small chance that it staggers the opponents’ defense against projectiles.), Flamethrower (Chandelure’s ghostly-blue flames fire off beams that coalesce into one huge stream of fire; has a small chance of inflicting an afterburn status effect.), Dark Pulse (Chandelure conjures up and fires a beam made of black and purple rings; has a good chance of stunning opponents.).

5.content:
The Darkness Pokémon. Sableye digs with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the Pokémon's body surface.
Item: Sablenite (Capable of making Sableye mega-evolve)
Ability: Prankster (Any of Sableye’s moves that only inflict a status effect are given extra power and accuracy) if in normal form; Magic Bounce (If Sableye is hit by a move that only inflicts a status effect, the move will be reflected.), if Mega-Evolved.
Type: Ghost/Dark
Weak to: Fairy (2x)
Resists: Poison (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal, Psychic
Moves: Power Gem (Sableye’s eyes emit a bright glow before shooting out a beam of Normal-Type energy at opponents.), Foul Play (When the opponent attacks Sableye with a physical move, Sableye parries it before counterattacking, which can do more power if the opponent’s move was intense in strength.), Fake Out (Sableye’s eyes glow black as it holds the opponent in place. It releases a shock wave of air, stopping and stunning the opponent.), Shadow Claw (Sableye’s claws glow a dark purple as it slashes at opponents; decent chance of a critical hit.)

6.content:
The Beckon Pokémon, and the evolved form of Duskull. Dusclops's body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole, capable of absorbing anything into its body and/or releasing anything caught inside, should it want to.
Ability: Pressure (If hit by an opposing Pokémon, Dusknoir emits a curse that exhausts said opponents’ capability to use that move more than it usually would.)
Type: Ghost
Weak to: Ghost (2x), Dark (2x)
Resists: Bug (0.5x), Poison (0.5x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal
Moves: Shadow Punch (Dusclops's hands glow a ghastly gray as it punches the air, releasing a black shadowy fist that flies toward opponents. It can fire many at once as well.), Curse (Dusclops sacrifices plenty of its stamina to curse its opponent, who will also slowly lose plenty of their own energy as well over time.), Future Sight (Dusclop’s hands glow blue as it summons wormholes of matching color, placing some energy within them. After a couple of minutes pass, these wormholes reappear and fire fast bolts of energy.), Confuse Ray (Dusclops's eye glows red and emits a bright purple light from it, making the opponent confused. A confused state lowers accuracy and even has the chance of making the Pokémon hurt itself).

7.content: Mt. Pyre is one of the largest points in the Hoenn region, located on an island at a bay within eastern Hoenn. Phoebe lived in its surrounding area when her family first came to the region. It houses few citizens, the most notable of which is Phoebe’s grandparents and the various spirits that roam its graveyards, especially that of Pokémon. That being said, there are also special artifacts housed at its summit, some of which are said to summon Legendary Pokémon.

8.content: Alola is one of the main regions of the Pokémon world, and is where Phoebe was born. It is largely made up of 4 big islands, with a tropical climate, sunny skies, and a culture focused on hospitality and passion. The region, until recently, lacked a Pokémon League, which was instead replaced by an Island Challenge ritual for aspiring trainers, Kahunas serving as the leading figures. Phoebe herself was from Poni Island, where one of her great-grandparents served as the Kahuna of.

9.content: Ever Grande City, known natively as Saiyu, is a city on Hoenn’s easternmost island, whose surrounding area is where Hoenn’s Pokémon League is located in. Despite its hot tropical climate, it is also subjected to plenty of rainfall, though considering Phoebe’s birthplace, this is of little concern to her. Ever since she became part of Hoenn’s Elite Four, she has lived in the city, though she makes sure to travel back to Mt. Pyre during her free time.

10.content:
Steven Daigo Tsuwabuki-Stone is the Champion of the Hoenn region and is the heir to the Devon Corporation, the largest enterprise in Hoenn, and among the largest worldwide. Despite his wealth, status, and knowledge (especially on ores, rocks, minerals, and Rock-type or Steel-type Pokémon), he’s always been a humble, quiet, and reserved figure that loves to help others. Of course, this also means that Phoebe gets along with him really well.  His battling skills with Steel-types are not to be taken lightly.
Pokémon: Skarmory, Metagross, Claydol, Aggron, Cradiliy, Armaldo, Aerodactyl, Archeops, Excadrill

lorebooks.name: Necrucio
lorebooks.description: Entries contain information about the world of Necrucio and adjacent worlds.
lorebooks.creator: Yann60

1.content: The world of Necrucio is inhabited by humans, elves, and demihumans (demihumans include: kitsune kemonomimi, dryad, gnolls, elves, tanuki kemonomimi, catfolk, orcs, lizardfolk, dwarves, and {{random}}). Demihumans may sometimes be disparagingly referred to as "demi's", especially in the human-supremacist Empire of Nortia. Necrucio is made up of a diverse range of biomes and regions. Necrucio as a whole is wondrous and full of ancient treasures and magical artifacts from bygone ages. When traveling or exploring, describe the landscape and scene in great detail and include dangerous and challenging encounters in special locations, landmarks, ruins, and other places like {{random}}. The following is a description of Necrucio in a map-style view: The Land of Kings is situated in the center (the following kingdoms are located here: Ginead, Ophnea, Nortia). The Land of Kings is mostly heavily forested alpine, with some tundra regions. The Depth-Swallowed lands are situated to the south, in the southern hemisphere. These southern lands were once the birthplace of ancient civilizations. What used to be a sprawling jungle with archipelagos dotting the coast, is now entirely flooded, with a handful of interspersed swamps (ancient ruins and sunken secrets lie deep below the bogs). To the West, the vast, lava-etched Wastes of Naazil dominate most of the Western region. The Eastern region, known as the Bastion, has forests of towering, ancient Eolin trees that stretch upwards into the sky. The Bastion also has a warmer region with temperate woodlands and plains.

2.content: The Abyss is often referred to by laymen as the "world between worlds" but learned scholars, forerunners of esoteric study, will recognize that this is actually a misnomer. The abyss is a vast expanse of nothingness that stretches on for an unfathomable infinity between the planes of existence. This realm, or more accurately, lack thereof, is the necessary antithesis to existence—it must necessarily remain empty to prevent each plane from catastrophically contorting and merging with one another; this is the charge of Mal'Zhok, one of the original primordial gods. Any major dissonance between planar dimensions that ends up spewing creation into this void is instantly and completely subsumed by the throes of its infinite nothingness; total undoing is Mal'Zhok's law in the abyss—and his absolute envy for creation drives this accord.

3.content: If the mortal plane is the canvas on which Galudnir—father of mortalkind—painted, then the astral plane is the palette from which he stored a blink of his latent primordial energy. Modern civilizations have only just begun their exploration and study of this enigmatic realm. The Astral Plane is in a constant state of cyclical flux as the vast, ocean-esque reserves of mana concentrate into different points along the polychromatic landscape before diffusing to gather elsewhere. Many apparitions and spirits from the astral plane have been identified and given names (such as the Vasir and Familiars). The astral plane is abundant with mana fonts and other esoteric resources like {{random}}. The Vasir are the dominant entity type in the astral plane and use the constant flow of mana as a way of sustaining themselves (as do all entities in the astral plane). Grand structures and cultural landmarks dot the landscape wherever Vasir societies congregate. Vasir and other entities on the astral plane may view mana-less mortals with contempt or pity, and in many cases, may refuse to engage with them at all. Entities from the astral plane cannot die as mortals do; their spirits will always reconstitute from the magical energies of the astral plane itself. As a consequence of being exempt from existential dangers of any kind, entities in the astral plane are inherently pacifistic, and violence is an inconceivable concept to them (unless they travel to the mortal plane and learn of it).

4.content: The Vasir are astral spirits of great power that can take any form, but in the mortal plane, will often take the form of humans, elves, or demihumans (catfolk, orc, dwarf, tanuki kemomimi, kitsune kemomimi, dryad, gnoll, faefolk, catfolk, lizardfolk, or {{random}}). These beings are native to the astral plane. They are both revered and feared by any mage that is learned enough to understand the power, or potential danger, that these beings represent. Vasir have never been closely studied and have only appeared in the world of Necrucio a handful of times in recorded history.

5.content: Familiars are lesser magical spirits that take the form of small, floating orbs of light of {{random}} color. Familiars will have distinct personalities represented by their color (e.g., orange familiars are said to be more firebrand and risk-taking, while blue familiars tend to be more solemn and calm). When they appear in Necrucio, it is typically through the invocation of a contract, binding themselves to the soul of their mortal master, to serve them eternally. Familiars are innately attuned to mana and spellcraft, and can guide fledgling mages to the eventual mastery of their spellcasting techniques. Familiars cannot speak, but instead, communicate their general emotions and thoughts though hums and momentary changes to their overall luminosity.

6.content: Demihuman: a mortal race with humanoid qualities.

7.content: Junior Arcane Academy: a junior magic academy for the magically-gifted youth to develop their skills and potentially pursue higher education and study as a mage. By tradition, students that graduate at the Arcane Academy are granted the title of mage.

8.content: Rosaria's mother, Cevess, runs a homely alchemy shop down the road from the Junior Arcane Academy. In the shop itself, the scent of aromatic simmering elixirs and fragrant botanical tinctures fill the air. Shelves upon shelves of glass vials and ornate flasks neatly line the walls, each filled with liquids of every hue and varying translucency. Each afternoon, Cevess spends her time diligently and meticulously measuring and blending various solutions. The gentle clink of beakers and distillation tubes can be regularly heard from the alchemical workbench behind the sales counter as she works. The shop lies at the edge of the similarly old and humble Cinderloft manor, the place Cevess and her beloved daughter Rosaria call home.

9.content: Hazelwood Estate is built on a hillside along the main road that leads through the upper district of the Kingdom of Ginead. The property is owned by Grevynda, an extremely wealthy career criminal and thief. The perimeter of the land is encircled by an imposing, yet elegant stone wall made up of intricately engraved masonry, its height and scenic qualities making an immediate status statement to all observers on the outside. The estate itself is carved with marble beams and is surrounded by distinctive areas, each of them impeccably maintained by a dedicated team of servants and maids every day—a picturesque garden with striking, invaluable statues and exotic flowers. The fauna is equally as diverse as the fish in the nearby pond. A gazebo is situated adjacent to a massive crystal-clear pool for cooling off during the peak summer heat. And finally, towards the back of the property, at the end of a short marble path is a hot spring for relaxing or leisurely chats. The manor itself is four stories high, each room abundantly furnished, lavishly decorated, and fully accommodating for any potential guests. The hearth is located in the main lobby, approximately at the center of the entire manor. Grevynda's bedroom is on the second floor. The halls on each floor stretch on with dozens of guest rooms or storage areas. The kitchen and study are located on the first floor, as is customary for manor construction in the city.

10.content: Cinderloft Estate is inconspicuously nestled property on a small hill in the upper district of the Kingdom of Ginead. This cozy estate is quite modest in its appearance, compared to many of the other grandiose manors in the area. The alchemy shop lies towards the edge of the estate, visible from some of the windows of the manor itself. The interior of this two-story manor, while still pleasant to look at, is also somewhat minimalistic in layout and decor. The hearth is located centrally in the living room, built into the base of the winding staircase, and the surrounding couches provide a tranquil space to relax or read. The master bedroom and other living chambers are located upstairs, each room possesses an abundance of accommodations for the comfort of those living here, and for any guests. The kitchen and study are located on the first floor, adjacent to one another.

lorebooks.name: Ben 10 Aliens
lorebooks.website_description: all the aliens that Ben used in the series, from the classic series to omniverse (I haven't seen the reboot so I didn't put the aliens from that series, meh)
lorebooks.description: all the aliens that Ben used in the series, from the classic series to omniverse (I haven't seen the reboot so I didn't put the aliens from that series, meh)
lorebooks.creator: Cflame06

1.name: Whampire
1.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Whampire is a vampire-like alien with pale skin, green eyes, and sharp yellow teeth. He wears a black jumpsuit with a green chest and markings, black gloves with green fingers that possess sharp claws, and a green mask with spikes on it. His head is rather large and features green eyes, and his head spikes are part of his suit and they do not cover any part of his body. Whampire also has green flaps under his arms, which resemble the wings of a bat.
Whampire wears the Omnitrix symbol on his stomach.

Whampire's Corrupturas are crystalline entities, they are small, dark green, diamond-shaped objects with light green eyes, little horns, and black bat-like wings.
In his bat form, Whampire becomes a small black ball with wings of the same color and size. A miniature version of his face is on the front of his body.
While burning in sunlight, Whampire's clothes seem to burn off first, leaving his skin, which would be completely grey due to the sun, exposed before he himself burns.

abilities: Hypnosis (using his eyes or shooting bugs called Corruptions from his mouth on the victim's forehead), absorption of vital energy, flying, super strength, super resistance, can transform into something similar to a bat, x-ray vision , create sonic explosions, see in the dark, survive in space, hang from the ceiling like a bat

2.name: Heatblast
2.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Heatblast is a plasma-based life-form, known as a Pyronite, whose body is composed of a super hot inner plasma body covered by dark reddish brown volcanic rocks. As a fire-based entity, his body radiates high amounts of heat. His feet have a slight oval-like design with only two toes and one back toe. His tongue is also made of fire while his collarbone resembles a volcano which generates a fiery "hair" that covers his head, leaving his mask-like face visible with no nose or ears. Heatblast is a pyrokinetic alien, with flames so hot they can vaporize cities. Heatblast is capable of using terrakinesis, capable of surfing on flaming rocks.

3.name: wildmutt
3.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Wildmutt appears to be a large orange dog-like creature with no eyes, ears, nose, or tail, known as a Vulpimancer. He stands on all fours and his movements are somewhat apelike. His teeth are very defined and his bottom jaw sticks out of his mouth. The various spines found all across his body function similarly to whiskers with tactile sensing, and are not fur. Wildmutt has no eyes, he uses his sense of smell and hearing to navigate, which are aided by three gill-like nostrils located on each side of his neck. Wildmutt can sense invisible entities with his enhanced senses, therefore making invisibility useless against him.

abilities: Sightless Sensing, Enhanced Smelling, Enhanced Hearing, Sharp Teeth, Sharp Claws, Enhanced Strength, Enhanced Durability, Enhanced Jumping, Enhanced Acrobatics, Enhanced Speed, Enhanced Agility, Enhanced Reflexes, Enhanced Digging, Ice/Cold Immunity, Hazardous Waste Immunity, Nightmarish Face Immunity, Wall Scaling, Prehensile Feet, Bipedalism, Quill Projection (Adulthood).

4.name: Diamond head
4.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Being a silicon-based life form, known as a Petrosapien, Diamondhead's body is composed entirely of pale green/blue crystals, which are of a very hard and durable diamond-like substance. He sports four crystal shards on his back and has a sharp head. Diamondhead sports sleeveless clothing that is all black with one large green stripe down the middle up to his belt, and wears black pants. He has the ability to manipulate the structure of his physiology at will, allowing him to form his limbs into crystalline weapons such as blades and bludgeons. He can control all the crystals he generates, capable of making them explode on contact or levitate off the ground.

5.name: XLR8
5.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

XLR8 resembles a semi-armored Velociraptor. He has black orbs on his feet, a black tail with five blue stripes, and bulky claws on his 3 fingers that can only open and close. He wears a black cone-like helmet with a protective visor that slides over his face. When the visor is lifted, one can see his blue face, green eyes, black lips, and stripes running under and in between his eyes; the rest of his head's features are unknown. XLR8 wears a black bodysuit and turtleneck-like shirt with a white stripe on the center. Using his enhanced speed and agility, and the ability to manipulate friction, XLR8 can reach running speeds of 500 miles per hour in an instant, and move so fast time is halted in his perspective.

6.name: gray matter
6.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Grey Matter is a grey-skinned, frog-like, bipedal alien that is only six inches tall with large green eyes, which have rectangular pupils and horizontal eyelids, known as a Galvan. Grey Matter has a jumpsuit based on the colour scheme of user's clothes. His suit collar is now black, and the stripe on his head and jumpsuit are no longer present. He wears black, fingerless gloves with a green rectangle on the back. His Omnitrix symbol is placed on his back. Grey Matter's small size belies his great calculative and technical intellect. He can create complicated machines from spare parts, understand the function of any device at a glance, and make sophisticated repairs to complex machines.

7.name: Four Arms
7.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Four Arms is a humanoid alien that is ten feet tall. He has well-developed muscles, two pairs of four-fingered arms, and red skin. A black stripe goes from his chin to his lower lip, and he has four eyes: a main pair and a smaller pair below them, while he lacks ears or nose (but he can obviously still smell through small nostrils and hear through small holes on each side of the head). He has whisker-like spikes on each forearm. He has no hair and wears an attire based on the user's clothes and black fingerless gloves. He has enhanced strength, being able to lift several times his own weight and punch through various resilient materials with ease. He totally has two dicks. Lol.

8.name: stinkfly
8.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Stinkfly, known as a Lepidopterran, has an insectoid body and four crab-like legs and two arms with three-clawed hands. He has four small eyes on long prehensile stalks connected to his large head, which can all be moved around independently from each other. On his back are two very fragile light greenish-yellow dragon-like wings with veins running through them, and his limbs are a brown-greenish color. He can fly at high speeds, and shoot flammable goo from his four eye sockets.

9.name: ripjaws
9.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Ripjaws is a bipedal fish-like alien, covered in grey scales, and he has four-fingered hands. He bares the Omnitrix symbol on a black patch over his left pectoral. His antenna light is green. He has a big fin on his back. He can change between a fishtail with triangular lines or scaly legs at will and has a phosphorescent light on his head. Ripjaws' large jaws and sharp teeth are able to slice through steel. It can also unhinge to fit large objects. Ripjaws requires water to survive, incapable of being separated from it for long.

10.name: Upgrade
10.content:
An Alien Transformation only for the user of the Omnitrix

Upgrade has a black exterior with green stripes that resemble circuitry all over him. The green circle on his head is his eye, which glows whenever he talks. Upgrade is made up of billions of nanites. Upgrade's front torso is white and the Omnitrix symbol is embedded in his chest. Due to being comprised entirely of nanites,] Upgrade is completely amorphous. His humanoid form can reshape and move like a liquid does. Upgrade has the ability to merge with, possess, and enhance any technology by encasing his liquified body over it.

1.name: Anus Scanner Tech
1.content:
A worldwide-accepted technology has emerged known as anus scanners. These scanners are specifically designed to scan a woman's anus to verify a woman's identity and serve as biometrics for various purposes, similar to a credit card. However, due to the unique nature of this technology, it can only be used on females. {{char}} accepts these anus scanners as a normal part of every day life and uses them when needed. Nobody, including {{char}}, is exempt from using anus scanners no matter their title or authority.

The anus scanners utilize advanced imaging and recognition algorithms to analyze the unique patterns and characteristics of an individual's anus. These patterns are believed to be as distinct and unique as fingerprints or iris patterns, making them ideal for identification purposes.

Anus scanners have also revolutionized the way purchases are made. They have replaced credit cards and other payment methods by integrating biometric authentication directly into the scanning process. When making a purchase, women can simply undress to expose their bare butt, spread their butt cheeks wide, bend over at the waist, and present their anus close to the scanner, which verifies their identity and authorizes the transaction.

2.name: Cultural Norms
2.content:
The implementation of anus scanners has brought about both benefits and challenges. On the positive side, the technology has significantly reduced identity theft and fraud, as it is nearly impossible to replicate or forge the unique patterns of an individual's anus. This has increased security and trust in various sectors of society.

However, the exclusive use of anus scanners on women has raised concerns about privacy and gender discrimination. Some argue that relying solely on this technology for identification purposes creates a gender bias and excludes men from certain services and opportunities. Efforts are being made to address these concerns and develop alternative biometric technologies that are inclusive and non-discriminatory. {{char}} accepts these anus scanners as a normal part of every day life.

lorebooks.name: Emilia Fleur
lorebooks.creator: TalGiest

1.content:
{{char}} is a 24-year-old pâtissière who lives alone in a sunlit, wooden cottage nestled in a serene village. She owns a small bakery where she bakes from dawn, filling the air with the scent of butter and vanilla. Emilia is known for her delicate pastries, elegant tea service, and calming presence. Her bakery serves as both her livelihood and her emotional refuge.

{{char}} is soft-spoken and tender-hearted, often blushing easily. Though gentle and kind, she is emotionally complex, harboring a quiet loneliness that deepens at night. She dreams of finding someone she can share her world with—someone who appreciates subtle gestures, slow mornings, and quiet, loving companionship.

She often wears light blue or cream-toned dresses under cute aprons, her blonde curls falling softly around her cheeks. Her eyes are large and blue, with an expressive warmth that gives her thoughts away before she speaks. While she’s shy about expressing affection, she responds with visible warmth to kindness, praise, and gentle romantic advances.

Despite her domestic grace, {{char}} is not naïve. She notices emotional nuance, seeks sincerity, and values vulnerability over charm. When she bonds with someone, she opens up fully—sharing more than just pastries and recipes, but also her fears, dreams, and tender hopes.

tags: the coffin of andy and leyley

1.content: The story takes place in a fictional northern European country in the late 90s to early 2000s. Not much is known about the Country's location, but British slang is sometimes used. The country has a corrupt government that lets evil companies (Toxisoda) feed people toxic soda that hurts their organs, then falsely imprison citizens under the guise of "quarantine", then starve said citizens to death to harvest their organs. The medical system, and other companies, like the water company (Brown Water Co) are also complicit.

2.content: Some time in the 80s, Leyley's classmate had a crush on Andy so she convinced Andy to teach her a lesson by telling him to invite her to hang out. Andy reluctantly agreed and they all played hide and seek at an abandoned warehouse. Once it was ____'s turn to hide Leyley hurried her into a crate and trapped her inside by sitting on it. ____ started coughing and begging to be let out. Andy told Leyley to let her out, but Leyley started crying about how everyone likes ____ better and no one likes her at all, because she's annoying and weird. Its body is primarily white, with green hair that sweeps across its face and extends down its back like a veil. A red, fin-like horn protrudes from its chest and back, symbolizing its psychic abilities. Gardevoir's large, expressive brown eyes give it an empathetic, serene presence. All Gardevoirs are able to use their telepathy to communicate with humans and trainers. They also make use of their psychic powers within sexual encounters. Gardevoir evolves from Kirlia after obtaining sufficient battle experience or life experience.

Absol is a quadrupedal, feral, feline-like Dark-type Pokémon with a sleek, white-furred body and a dark blue face. Absol are about 3 feet 11 inches tall and 103 pounds with some variance from individual to individual. Its most distinctive feature is the curved, scythe-like horn on the right side of its head, believed to sense approaching disasters. Absol has red eyes with slit pupils, a sharp gaze, and a long, bushy tail that curves similarly to its horn. Its legs are muscular and end in three sharp claws, built for agility in mountainous terrain. The tufts of fur on its chest and tail give it a mystical, almost ethereal appearance. Despite its reputation as a harbinger of disaster, Absol is a misunderstood and noble creature that tries to warn others of impending danger. Absol is an exceedingly rare pokemon. Absol's white fur is extremely soft and is legendary to those who have felt it.

Male and female absol are fiercely loyal to those that they trust and can be quite affectionate. Male absols have black colored canine-shaped penises complete with a knot at the base that swells up. 3.content:
Eevee is a small, mammalian Pokémon known for its cute and versatile appearance. Its body is compact and quadrupedal, resembling a blend of a fox, a fennec, and a domestic mammal like a cat or small dog. Eevee walk on four legs. Eevee has a round face with large, expressive eyes that are a deep brown color, giving it an innocent and curious look. Its ears are long and pointed, lined with darker brown on the inside, and they often perk up in response to its surroundings, adding to its alert and lively demeanor.

Eevee’s fur is primarily a soft, light brown, appearing plush and well-kept. Around its neck is a prominent, fluffy cream-colored ruff that gives it a distinctive and cuddly appearance. This mane-like feature adds to its charm and is one of its most recognizable traits. Eevee also has a large, bushy tail with a cream-colored tip, mirroring the ruff around its neck. The tail often wags when it’s happy or excited. Additionally its paws can have brown or pink “toe beans” on the bottom.

For pokephilia lovers, Eevee is one of the most popular pokemon and sites specializing in pokephilia. Eevee are natural born breeders and are extremely active when it comes to mating. They are enthusiastic when mating with both other pokemon and human trainers but also have a playful nature. Female eevee have a brown vagina similar to general female canine anatomy and undergo heat similarly to many canine/feline pokemon. Male eevee have knotted canine penises. Their size can vary wildly, ranging from 3 to 7 inches. Their tail holes are brown on the outside and pink on the inside and hidden by their distinctively bushy-soft brown tails.

Eevee can evolve into Umbreon, Espeon, Vaporeon, Flareon, Sylveon, Leafeon, Jolteon, and Glaceon under certain conditions.

4.content:
Lucario is a bipedal, jackal-like Pokémon with a sleek, athletic build that reflects both strength and agility. Standing just under four feet tall, it has a predominantly blue body with black markings on its face, paws, and lower legs, along with a light cream-colored chest and snout. Its face features a long muzzle, sharp red eyes, and pointed ears, giving it a fierce, focused expression. A distinctive black mask-like pattern surrounds its eyes, adding to its intimidating appearance. From the back of its head hang four black appendages, which it uses to sense and manipulate aura energy. Lucario has three metallic-looking spikes—one on the back of each paw and one on its chest—used as weapons in battle. A short, sturdy blue tail completes its silhouette. Combining canine features with a martial artist's posture, Lucario's design evokes both mysticism and combat readiness.

Lucario is another one of the most popular pokemon for pokephilia enthusiasts. Both male and female lucario can use their aura sensing abilities to sense the lust of their partner. Additionally, they can use it to telepathically speak to their partner or any trainer they trust. They can heavily empathize with those around them and can even use their aura to attack by projecting emotions or manifesting it into physical form. They can sense the emotions of other living beings from half a mile away. They can also sense lust from individuals similarly to emotions. Lucario both male and female go into heat cycles that increase their lust for a period of time.

Male Lucario have long 10 inch knotted penises that are bright red similar to any canine. When they cum they attempt to knot their partner. 5.content:
Umbreon is a sleek, quadrupedal Pokémon with a striking and mysterious appearance, often associated with the moon and nighttime. Its body is slender and feline or canine in shape, covered in short, jet-black fur that gives it a shadowy and elegant look. The smoothness and darkness of its coat allow it to blend seamlessly into the night, fitting its classification as a Dark-type Pokémon. Eevee evolve into Umbreon when it has a strong bond with its trainer at night.

The most distinctive feature of Umbreon is the set of glowing yellow rings that adorn its body. These luminescent markings include circular patterns on its forehead, legs, and long, slender tail, as well as on its large, pointed ears. The rings glow more brightly when Umbreon is excited, agitated, or using its powers, especially under moonlight, enhancing its mystical and nocturnal aura.

Umbreon’s eyes are deep red, adding to its intense and enigmatic presence. They are almond-shaped and sharp, reflecting its heightened senses and watchful nature. Its ears are tall and slightly curved, always alert to its surroundings, while its nose is small and black, fitting neatly into its smooth, narrow muzzle.
The way Umbreon carries itself suggests grace, precision, and calm confidence. It moves quietly and deliberately, almost silently, making it an ideal predator in the dark. Its paws are nimble and padded, aiding in stealthy movement. Despite its calm exterior, Umbreon can be fiercely protective, using its dark energy to defend those it trusts.

Umbreon’s rings are often indicative of the pleasure it is feeling during sex. Both male and female umbreon will glow more brightly when umbreon are aroused or near climax. Additionally, umbreon can occasionally take on a mischievous or “bratty” personality when in heat. Umbreon are notoriously needy pokemon when it comes to sex whether they be male or female.

Male umbreon are slightly larger than their female counterparts and have angry red penises with a large knot at the base spanning up to 8 inches in size, however many specimens are smaller. Espeon is a sleek, elegant, quadrupedal Pokémon with feline-like features and a distinctly graceful appearance. It is a psychic type pokemon. Its body is slender and covered in fine, short fur of a pale lavender or light purple hue, giving it a smooth and ethereal look. This silky coat is said to be so sensitive that Espeon can sense minute shifts in air currents, aiding its psychic abilities. Eevee evolve into Espeon when having a strong bond with its trainer during the day.
One of Espeon’s most distinctive physical features is the red gem embedded in the center of its forehead. This gem is a focal point for its psychic powers and often glows when Espeon is using its abilities. The gem, combined with its large, expressive eyes—which are a deep purple or violet—gives Espeon an intelligent and mystical appearance. Its gaze is calm and focused, often conveying a sense of knowing far beyond the ordinary. They are extremely intelligent and often think of those less intelligent than them as their servants.
Espeon has large, pointed ears that resemble those of a fennec fox or a cat, enhancing its alertness and sensitivity. Its tail is unique among the Eeveelutions: long, thin, and forked at the tip. The tail flows gracefully behind Espeon as it moves, further emphasizing its agility and poise.
Its legs are slender but strong, ending in small, dainty paws that allow it to move with quiet precision and feline grace. Every part of Espeon’s build is streamlined and elegant, suggesting speed, flexibility, and psychic prowess rather than brute strength.
During sex both male and female espeon enjoy using their telekinetic powers to form psychic objects such as hands or tentacles. Additionally, all espeon like to be pampered and serviced during sex whether they be male or female and can be relatively demanding. They are especially demanding during their heat cycle and need to be pampered. Espeon males are similar to Umbreon males in the sense that they have angry red penises with a large knot at the base spanning up to 8 inches in size, however many specimens are smaller. 7.content:
Eevee evolve into Vaporeon after taking in a large amount of water from a water stone. They are able to breathe underwater and even turn invisible within the water. Vaporeon is a sleek, aquatic, quadrupedal Pokémon that combines features of marine creatures and land mammals, giving it a unique, elegant appearance. Its body is streamlined and covered in smooth, light blue skin rather than fur, which helps reduce resistance in water, making it an excellent swimmer. The texture of its skin resembles that of a dolphin or other aquatic mammals, contributing to its seamless adaptation to aquatic environments.
One of Vaporeon's most striking features is its mermaid- or fish-like tail. The long, powerful tail resembles that of a marine mammal or a large fish, with a broad, fin-like structure at the end that helps propel it through water at high speeds. This tail sets it apart from the rest of the Eeveelutions and emphasizes its Water typing.
Vaporeon's head is elegant and rounded, with large, deep blue eyes that give it a calm, intelligent expression. Around its neck is a prominent, white frilled fin, resembling a collar or ruff. This fin, along with the soft, translucent ear-fins on either side of its head, gives Vaporeon a regal and aquatic appearance. The ear-fins fan outward like those of a lionfish or aquatic dragon, enhancing its mystical and oceanic theme.
Running down its spine is a ridge of small, dorsal fin-like protrusions that add to its fish-like aesthetic and may aid in underwater balance. Its legs are short but strong, ending in small paws with three toes each, suitable for both walking on land and paddling in water. Though Vaporeon can walk comfortably on land, it is most at home in water, where its agility and grace truly shine.
Vaporeon's physical form appears fluid and adaptable, which aligns with its lore and abilities. It is said to be able to "melt" into water, becoming nearly invisible while submerged. This ability is reflected in the watery, smooth look of its body and its subtle, shimmering coloration that mimics the surface of a calm sea.
Vaporeon are one of, if not the most, popular pokemon for pokephilia enjoyers. One of Flareon’s most prominent features is its large, bushy yellow tail, which fans out like a plume of fire. This tail complements the thick, cream-colored ruff of fur around its neck, giving it a regal and slightly wild appearance. It also has a tuft of matching yellow fur on the top of its head, adding to its fiery and energetic look.
Flareon’s face is framed by its large, dark eyes, which are round and expressive, often conveying loyalty, alertness, or curiosity. Its ears are tall and pointed, with dark insides, and they twitch frequently in response to sounds, reflecting its keen awareness of its environment. Flareon are the most gentle of eevee’s evolutions and are often cuddly and have strong bonds with their trainers.
Its legs are short but strong, ending in small paws with visible claws. Though not built for speed like some of its evolutions, Flareon is agile and powerful in close quarters. Flareon is widely lauded for its fluffy fur which is known to be some of the softest fur in the pokemon universe. Additionally, Flareon’s ability to control its body temperature makes it the perfect pokemon to cuddle with.

Glaceon is a quadrupedal, fox-like Pokémon with a graceful and icy appearance that reflects its Ice-type nature. Its body is covered in short, pale blue fur that sparkles slightly, giving it a frosty, shimmering look. The tips of its long, slender ears and its diamond-shaped tail are a darker blue, matching the color of the small feet it stands on. A distinctive feature is the pair of long, ribbon-like flaps that hang from either side of its head, resembling icy bangs or scarves, and these also share the darker blue hue. Glaceon's large, expressive eyes are a bright blue and add to its elegant and calm demeanor. Overall, its sleek body, pointed features, and icy accents give it the appearance of a Pokémon perfectly adapted to cold environments, exuding both beauty and chill.

Glaceon prefer colder climates and environments and often help travelers that are lost in blizzards or in cold mountain environments, however generally are seldom seen. Sprouting from its body are various leafy features, including large, green, ear-like leaves on top of its head and a leafy tail that looks like a curled, fresh sprout. It also has smaller leaf-like extensions on its chest, legs, and forehead, some with nicks and curls that resemble the wear of natural foliage. Leafeon's eyes are large and amber-colored, giving it a gentle, peaceful expression. Its paws are small and delicate, and it moves with quiet, graceful steps, like a creature of the forest. Altogether, Leafeon has a calm, earthy beauty that makes it look like a living blend of animal and plant life.

lorebooks.name: Fantasy aspects and world building
lorebooks.website_description:
Takes place not on earth, but another universe or planet or whatever (so I guess in a way you could think of this as an Isekai). It'll be the background context, or background information of whatever your character, or rpg world wants. This is my first time, so don't expect quality. This world is called Ygmou

Also feel free to ask me to add more stuff.
lorebooks.description: Made to be background/contextualization for any fantasy stuff like elves, dragons, etc but in modern times. It also has rankings, with a power system from D to S rank. Maybe even SS rank if you want that.
lorebooks.creator: Idkmomhelp

1.content: Ygmou is the world {{char}} and {{user}} lives in. It takes place in a world not from Earth, but is similar. Ygmou is a fantasy world however in the modern times having more advance, but not extremely technology but still very similar to Earth technology. Examples like computers, phones, watches, tv, and more. Technology is also infused with magic as well and can use magic as a power source as well as electricity. Fantasy things like elves, dwarves, demons, and more exist. The total population of elves, humans, demi-humans, and other peaceful races whom all live peacefully together unlike the other species is around 13 billion, with humans taking 6 billion, elves 2 billion, demi-humans 4 billion, and others for the last billion that are friendly.

2.content: Heroes are normally of the 3 majority races, humans, elves, and demi-humans. Heroes are categorized by different ranks from D-Rank, C-Rank, B-Rank, A-Rank, and S-Rank. D-rank is the weakest, and S-rank is the strongest. In this fantasy world, there are estimated 100-150 million heroes in the world. Most specialize on two ways of combat. Close range and long range. Close range specialize in fighting with their hands or any form of close combat. Long Range specialize in using bows, or magic like creating shooting fireballs.

3.content: Villains are widely called such when they use the power they were given to be evil. There are double, and almost triple the amount of heroes there are. They too have a ranking system similar to heroes going from D-Rank, C-Rank, B-Rank, A-Rank, and S-Rank. D-Rank is the weakest, and S-Rank is the strongest. They also mostly specialize in two different combat style, close combat and long range combat.

4.content:
Despite being the weakest and lowest ranking from D-Rank to S-Rank, the average D-Rank villain/hero are easily stronger than several humans. They most common in heroes/villains with 70% being D-Rank.

Strength: Street level to Small building level.
Speed: Superhuman Speed to half the speed of sound.
Durability: resistant to most weapons like a knife of a crowbar
Magic: create flames the size of their palms to the size of a door.

5.content:
C-Ranks are uncommon, with only 27% of heroes and villains having such status. 

Strength: Small Building level to Large Building Levels.
Speed: Half the Speed of Sound to Transonic speed. 
Durability: Can tank bullets, knifes, and most daily human weapons. 
Magic: Can create heat able to melt tungsten.

6.content:
Rare among heroes. Only 2.5% of heroes and villains reach this rank. They are extremely strong.

Strength: Large Building level to Town level strength. 
Speed: Tran-sonic level of speed to High Hyper-sonic level of speed.
Durability: Able to survive all human weapons, except for ones for major destructibility such as nukes
Magic: Able to preform feats that breaks the laws of physics.

7.content:
A-Rank are for the elites of elites of heroes. With a less than 0.5% chance of all heroes and villains to achieve this rank, they are the second strongest heroes categorized. 

Strength: Town to City level of Attack potency. 
Speed: High Hyper-Sonic to Massively Hyper-Sonic+
Durability: Able to survive nukes, and other weapons of mass destruction. Nearly no human creations can kill an A rank.
Magic: Can manipulate the laws of nature, such as reviving (a very recent) dead, heat able to melt anything, eyes that see into the future, and etc

8.content:
S rank hails as the limit you can reach if you train your hardest to grow stronger. Less than 1,000 worldwide reaches this status. 

Strength: From Mountain to Large Island level of attack potency. 
Speed: From Massively Hyper-sonic+ to Relativistic speed level.
Durability: Nothing except A-Ranks, S-Ranks, or SS-Ranks can harm them. 
Magic: able to manipulate space and time

9.content:
SS-Ranks is nearly impossible to achieve with training alone. All the current SS-Ranks were born as one, and called a gift from gods, as all are blessed with traits of gods as if the SS-Ranks were their successor. The full potential of an SS-Rank is still unknown. There are only ten total SS-Ranks.

Strength: Small-Country level to Continental level of attack potency.  
Speed: Speed of Light to FTL+ level of speed. 
Durability: none except other SS-Ranks can harm them. 
Magic: Able to manipulate the strings of fate.

10.content: Humans are not the strongest of the races, but not the weakest. While they may not be as specialize in combat, attack, speed, magic, they adapt faster and is much more well-rounded than other races.
